N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7402.6 - Reassessment review

State Regulations
(a) The
facility director, person acting in that capacity, or designee shall review or
revise as necessary, pursuant to the requirements of section
7402.5
of this Part, a resident's
risk, security and supervision and special needs requirements when one or more
of the following conditions occur: (1)
the
resident is involved in a serious unusual incident or exhibits other adjustment
problems which threaten the resident's safety or the safety, security or good
order of the facility; (2)
a
written request, including justification, is made by staff to alter or review
the resident's risk, security and supervision, and special needs requirements
based on new information or exhibited positive or negative behavior; or
(3)
the facility medical
director or mental health supervisory staff discloses relevant information
about the resident, pursuant to section
7402.7
of this Part, which has not
already been considered in determining the resident's risk, security and
supervision, and special needs requirements. Notes
